solution_line_template: He gets {bones_per_month} new bones, every month for {num_months} months so he has {bones_per_month}*{num_months} = <<{bones_per_month}*{num_months}={total_bones_received}>>{total_bones_received} dog bones
He has {bones_available} bones available which means he has buried {total_bones_received}-{bones_available} = <<{total_bones_received}-{bones_available}={bones_buried}>>{bones_buried} bones
